details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.2.3 Schemas - Extension schema definition - schema field
details.description: Field 'schema' of the PDF/A Schema value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall be present and shall have type Text and namespace prefix 'pdfaSchema'.

rule.description: Field 'schema' of the PDF/A Schema value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall be present and shall have type Text and namespace prefix 'pdfaSchema'.

error.message: Field 'schema' of the PDF/A Schema value type is not present, or doesn't have prefix 'pdfaSchema' (schema prefix = %1) or doesn't have type Text (isSchemaValidText = %2)
